seed_song.track_name: The Wasp (Texas Radio And The Big Beat)

segue_the_chain: The Doors were named after Aldous Huxley’s novel ‘The Doors Of Perception’. It’s a drug-fueled novel, as is Thomas De Quincey’s ‘Confessions Of An English Opium-Eater’. Quincy Jones produced Michael Jackson’s ‘Thriller’…

segue_dave.line: A radio link, to a song from the album "Spaceball: The American Radio Sessions"...
